name: True Crime and Astrology (ebook)
description:
Ever wonder if the heavens act in synchronicity with physical events happening on the Earth? This book attempts to do just that - analyzing crimes. Astrology is a language all to it’s own and to read a birth chart is to see correspondences in the symbolism in that chart pertaining to life on Earth. Using this language, the author attempts to find explanations to crimes that continue to baffle and mystify us. What were the alignments in the heavens when these crimes were committed? 

Zodiac Murders 
JFK Assassination 
DB Cooper’s Jump 
Jimmy Hoffa’s Disappearance 
The John List Massacre 
Jack the Ripper’s Crime Spree 
The Death of George Reeves 
Cynthia Anderson Disappearance 

The author takes a look at possible motives and solutions to famous crimes using astrology. Brief descriptions are also included in the first part of the book explaining what Astrology is and how it works. (without charts - charts can be looked up online, for those so inclined)
